title: Frodo's Pipe (3U107)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession • Pipe
Game Text:	Bearer must be Frodo. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to heal a companion with the Frodo signet X times.
Lore:	”'All the same, observations that I have made on my own many journeys south have convinced me that the weed itself is not native to our parts of the world.'”
Rarity:	U
